channel.title: free on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in free on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Important units seen from Python lecture materials at Kyoto University
item.description: #Introduction February 13 Kyoto University has released Python lecture materials free of charge. Relation: Lecture Material Repository Introduction article-Qiita Introduction article-CodeZine The content is quite fulfilling. (Not perfect…) It seems that learning at home will be the key for the future, partly because of COVID-19, so let’s make effective use of it. I myself use the basics of Python obscurely, so I would like to take this opportunity to fully understand it.

item.title: [Python] Kyoto University Python programming exercise materials released for free
item.description: #Overview The textbooks based on the lessons held as a common subject at Kyoto University in 2018 are released for free. The following three goals are achieved It becomes possible to do the basic operation about the execution of the program by Python. Explain the functions and formats of the basic elements that make up a Python program, and be able to configure execution examples using examples. You will be able to design, implement, and test a simple program yourself using Python.
